sentence:
Ms. DeLAURO. Mr. Speaker, I offer a motion to instruct conferees.

Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of the motion to instruct conferees to  adopt the Senate funding level for Special Supplemental Nutrition  Program for Women, Infants, and…

…was absent from the floor and the missed  Roll Call votes numbered 263 and 264. Had I been present, I would have  voted: YEA on Roll Call No. 263 on the Motion to Instruct Conferees on  HR 3944, and NAY on Roll Call No. 264 on Final Passage HR 3486.                             PERSONAL EXPLANATION
